channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaf sludge on road, 1st February
item.description:
The kerbside approx 40m either side of 54 Prestbury Road is covered in leaf sludge from over 2 years accumulation which is turning the parking area into hazardous state for motorists when parking as it is easy to lose your footing on the road after parking, especially in wet weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54;54a, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, 1st February
item.description:
Just before the single lane by a property called Broadwell I think!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Appalling state of the road, 1st February
item.description:
This area of kidnappers lane is in an appalling state. It is full of potholes and always have puddles on rainy days which makes it difficult to know whether it is a just a puddle or a pothole on the road. That makes it very dangerous to drive on it and difficult to avoid the deep potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked culvert at side of road in Bushcombe Lane just above Butts Lane, 1st February
item.description:
Water is pouring across Bushcombe Lane and down to Station Road, if this freezes there will be a snager to pedestrians and cars. As you drive up Bushcombe Lane the culvert is on the left just after the turning into Bitts Lane. This has happened numerous times and it is only a matter of until someone is injured by slipping on ice if it freezes or a car skid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Very deep pot hole on elm street, 1st February
item.description:
Very deep pothole, actually deeper than a tennis ball but wouldn't let me report when selecting this option. Currently no paint around it. Difficult to avoid when the street is busy
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Elm Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pots holes all over the turning and along shelbourne road, 1st February
item.description:
Shelbourne road is full of potholes and blocked drains. Absolute state of the roads you should be ashamed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Cyclist crossing button doesn't work, 1st February
item.description:
The button for cyclists to cross (if they're not detected by the automatic camera) still doesn't work. Doesn't register and no lights illuminate. Has been reported multiple times since installation several years ago.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
